item.title: Microsoft Will Remove the Free VPN That Comes With Windows Defender Soon
item.description:
The feature will no longer be available starting Feb. 28. Microsoft wants to focus on “new areas that will better align to customer needs.”

Go to Source

item.title: Microsoft Reveals New Surface Laptop 7 and Surface Pro 11 With Intel Chips
item.description:
The Surface Laptop 7 and Surface Pro 11 PCs for business include Copilot+ AI features.

Go to Source
